listing_by_account.map: function (doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'task' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc._id, doc.pvt_account_id], { 'id':doc._id, 'account_id':doc.pvt_account_id, 'category':doc.pvt_category, 'action':doc.pvt_action, 'submitted_at':doc.pvt_submitted_at, 'started_at':(doc.pvt_started_at)?doc.pvt_started_at:undefined, 'ended_at':(doc.pvt_ended_at)?doc.pvt_ended_at:undefined, 'is_terminated':(doc.pvt_is_terminated)?doc.pvt_is_terminated:undefined, 'is_success':(doc.pvt_is_success)?doc.pvt_is_success:undefined, 'error':(doc.pvt_error)?doc.pvt_error:undefined, 'ran_for':(doc.pvt_ran_for)?doc.pvt_ran_for:undefined }); }
